abilities.name: Breathe Fire
abilities.description: Dragon Knight breathes a cone of fire in front of him, dealing damage to enemies and reducing their attack damage.
abilities.notes: The fire is expelled in a cone in front of Dragon Knight.

abilities.name: Dragon Tail
abilities.description: Dragon Knight slams his shield into the target, stunning them. When in Elder Dragon Form, the attack becomes ranged and hits in a small area.
abilities.notes: When in Elder Dragon Form, Dragon Tail becomes a ranged attack and hits in a small area.

abilities.name: Wyrm's Wrath
abilities.description: Imbues Dragon Knight's attacks with draconic energy, granting different effects based on the selected dragon type.
abilities.notes: Effect depends on the selected dragon type: Fire, Corrosive, or Frost.

abilities.name: Elder Dragon Form
abilities.description: Dragon Knight transforms into an Elder Dragon, gaining a ranged attack and additional powers based on the level of Elder Dragon Form.
abilities.notes: Level 1: Green Dragon - Corrosive Breath. Level 2: Red Dragon - Adds Splash Attack. Level 3: Blue Dragon - Adds Frost Breath.

innate_abilities.name: Dragon Blood
innate_abilities.description: The blood of a dragon flows through Dragon Knight, granting him health regeneration and bonus armor.
innate_abilities.notes: Can be disabled by Break status.
